title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers that reality is a simulation created by intelligent machines. He joins a rebellion to break free from the artificial dream world and awaken humanity to the true nature of their existence, exploring themes of reality, consciousness, and freedom.
keywords: reality simulation, hackers, machines, awakening, virtual world, philosophy

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief who enters people's dreams to steal corporate secrets is offered a chance to have his criminal record erased. He must perform the inverse task: planting an idea in someone's subconscious through shared dreaming, navigating multiple layers of dreams within dreams.
keywords: dreams, subconscious, heist, reality layers, memory extraction, shared dreaming

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son. A powerful saga about family, power, loyalty, and the corruption of the American dream in the world of organized crime.
keywords: mafia, family, power, crime, loyalty, corruption, organized crime

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Interconnected stories of Los Angeles mobsters, fringe players, small-time criminals, and a mysterious briefcase. A nonlinear narrative exploring violence, redemption, and the unpredictable, often surreal nature of life and crime.
keywords: nonlinear, crime, redemption, violence, dark humor, interconnected stories

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge in the Joker, an agent of chaos who tests the boundaries between order and anarchy. A psychological battle that questions the nature of justice, heroism, and morality in a gritty urban landscape.
keywords: superhero, chaos, justice, morality, psychological, heroism, anarchy

title: Interstellar
description: In a future where Earth is dying, a team of explorers travel through a recently discovered wormhole in search of a new home for humanity. A journey through space, time, and the boundaries of human understanding, love, and survival.
keywords: space travel, wormhole, time dilation, survival, love, exploration, physics

title: Forrest Gump
description: A man with a low IQ witnesses and unwittingly influences several defining historical events in 20th century America. A heartwarming story about love, destiny, innocence, and the American dream seen through uniquely optimistic eyes.
keywords: innocence, historical events, love, destiny, American dream, optimism

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency. A powerful tale of hope, friendship, perseverance, and the triumph of the human spirit against injustice.
keywords: prison, hope, friendship, redemption, injustice, perseverance, freedom

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a reality television show. He must confront the nature of his existence and decide whether to remain in his artificial world or venture into the unknown reality.
keywords: reality TV, artificial life, existential crisis, freedom, manipulation, discovery

title: Blade Runner
description: In a dystopian future, a blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator. A philosophical exploration of humanity, memory, and what it means to be alive.
keywords: replicants, dystopia, humanity, memory, identity, future, philosophy

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories. But as the memories fade, they rediscover the reasons they fell in love in the first place.
keywords: memory, love, relationships, erasure, second chances, emotions

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in a competitive one-upmanship to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other. A tale of obsession, secrecy, and the price of greatness.
keywords: magic, rivalry, obsession, illusion, sacrifice, secrecy, competition

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home. A story about nature, colonization, and finding one's true identity.
keywords: aliens, nature, colonization, identity, adventure, environment, biosphere

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend. He must make sure his high-school-age parents unite or he will cease to exist.
keywords: time travel, comedy, family, adventure, 80s, science, paradox

title: The Social Network
description: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the company.
keywords: facebook, entrepreneurship, betrayal, innovation, lawsuits, friendship

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American man visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.
keywords: racism, psychological, suspense, social commentary, mind control

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
keywords: class struggle, family, dark comedy, social inequality, deception

title: Spirited Away
description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, where humans are changed into beasts.
keywords: spirits, bathhouse, fantasy, coming of age, Japanese folklore

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.
keywords: mental illness, society, violence, transformation, chaos

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.
keywords: serial killer, FBI, psychology, cannibalism, investigation

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.
keywords: music, dance, Hollywood, dreams, jazz, romance

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
keywords: middle-earth, fellowship, ring, quest, epic, mythology

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
keywords: wakanda, royalty, technology, heritage, superhero

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
keywords: toys, friendship, childhood, adventure, animation

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
keywords: hotel, isolation, madness, supernatural, winter

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.
keywords: post-apocalyptic, chase, rebellion, survival, wasteland

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
keywords: undercover, police, mob, double life, betrayal

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.
keywords: space, survival, isolation, NASA, disaster

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
keywords: africa, animals, royalty, coming of age, circle of life

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
keywords: mafia, true story, rise and fall, crime life, loyalty

title: The Exorcist
description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.
keywords: possession, demon, religion, exorcism, supernatural

title: Whiplash
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
keywords: music, obsession, perfection, jazz, mentorship

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
keywords: rome, revenge, colosseum, empire, historical

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
keywords: superhero team, aliens, New York, marvel, ensemble

title: Her
description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.
keywords: artificial intelligence, love, loneliness, future, technology
